pullrequest.title: Unify emitters, decouple Iface and Gui

content.raw:
I added some checks that global events are being emitted to `gzgui_test` in d9a39d5. 

While doing it, I realized the existing tests were never triggering our callbacks. That was happening because the test fixture is dynamically created after the callbacks were setup on gzgui, and JQuery's `click` doesn't work with dynamically created elements. So I changed the callbacks being tested to use `on.('click')`, which works for the test.
